subject: Cholesterol drugs worse than thought previously
body:
Dear Subscriber ,

If you are concerned about Cholesterol, then I recommend you try Cholesterblock. 
It is a natural substance that works quickly and effectively without livertoxicity or other side effects. When you combine Cholesterblock with an overall plan of healthy eating, exercise and life style modification you now have a way of living that can be maintained easily and with very little cost for the rest of your lives. The American Diet is responsible for turning the US into one of the fattest and unhealthiest countries in the world. The immediate response by the medical community is too often a prescription medication. Taking 
a prescription drug with the potential to cause liver damage without attempting a nutritional/supplementation approach seems risky.If you take a prescription cholesterol medication, try Cholesterblock. Once you see how well it works for you, your doctor may let you reduce or stop your prescription. 
If you do not take prescription cholesterol medication, try Cholesterblock and perhaps you will never have to.

http://soccervantage.com/t/qycc6-j-h/145454

Sincerely,


Dr Arlene Donar ND
Board Certified Medical Director
